About

The more I learn, the more I realize how much I don't know. ― Albert Einstein

I consider myself a tinkerer and problem solver. I have a strong attachment to Linux and DIY mindset. My idea of a weekend project would be building and flying a drone or fixing up a Raspberry Pi with my home electricals! I have worn many hats in the past and have worked as a web developer, a system administrator and a team lead for an open source project.

I am working as a DevOps Engineer with 4+ years of experience. Currently my focus in on Golang and Kubernetes. I have worked with various clients to provide cloud-native solutions with programmable infrastructure using modern tools - Docker, Helm, Terraform, Prometheus, Grafana, Ansible, etc. I have contributed to and also led a team to drive the work on an open source project, EasyEngine.

If any of the above sounds interesting and you’d like to chat, drop an email at contact at mriyam dot dev or select a slot on my calendar to schedule a meeting.

Thanks for reading.
